# Archive

This page is an archive of job postings which are no longer active. [Ads are considered to be no longer active if either (a) the posting department has explicitly said that the posting is inactive or (b) the ad was posted before July 1st. ]{.aside} It is provided primarily for historical purposes. Links navigate to the original job postings. These links may be broken, contain outdated information, or otherwise be unreliable. 

::: {.notice .notice-blue}

This archive only goes back as far as our recent migration to a new website publishing system in advance of the 2025-2026 hiring season. If you are interested in older job postings, please check out previous versions of our site:

- [2024-2025](https://cs-pui.github.io/cs-pui.github.io-archive/index-24)
- [2023-2024](https://cs-pui.github.io/cs-pui.github.io-archive/index-23)
- [2022-2023](https://cs-pui.github.io/cs-pui.github.io-archive/index-22)
- [2021-2022](https://cs-pui.github.io/cs-pui.github.io-archive/index-21)
- [2020-2021](https://cs-pui.github.io/cs-pui.github.io-archive/index-20) - The first year of `cs-pui.github.io`!
- [2019-2020](https://evanmpeck.medium.com/cs-academic-job-market-for-liberal-arts-colleges-19-20-cd348423f919) - job ads were kept track of in a blog post
- [2018-2019](https://mobile.twitter.com/EvanMPeck/status/1040402908657934336) -  job ads were kept track in a running Twitter thread this year
